Instruction: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Let raisins sit in boiling water for 10 minutes to rehydrate. Then, drain and finely chop them.

Beat butter and sugar together in a medium bowl until light and fluffy. Add and mix eggs one at a time. Blend in vanilla, sour cream, walnuts, and chopped raisins. Pour mixture into the pre-baked pie crust.
